languages.text: Шкала Особых способностей корабля заполняется постепенно — ее значение увеличивается каждый ход, в конце боя, а также во время некоторых событий в космосе.

The ship's ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} bar gradually fills up on each of your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} in combat, at the end of each battle, and as a result of certain events during space exploration.
languages.original_text: Шкала Особых способностей корабля заполняется постепенно — ее значение увеличивается каждый ход, в конце боя, а также во время некоторых событий в космосе.

traits.locale_text: The ship's ultimate cooldown bar gradually fills up on each of your flagship's turns in combat, at the end of each battle, and as a result of certain events during space exploration.
The ship's ultimate cooldown bar gradually fills up on each of your flagship's turns in combat, at the end of each battle, and as a result of certain events during space exploration.
The ship's ultimate cooldown bar gradually fills up on each of your flagship's turns in combat, at the end of each battle, and as a result of certain events during space exploration.

The ship's ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} bar gradually fills up on each of your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} in combat, at the end of each battle, and as a result of certain events during space exploration.

The ship's ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} bar gradually fills up on each of your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} in combat, at the end of each battle, and as a result of certain events during space exploration.

languages.text: La barra de {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}recuperación{/g} de capacidad definitiva se llena gradualmente con cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de tu {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} en combate, al final de cada batalla y como consecuencia de eventos concretos durante la exploración del espacio.
languages.original_text: The ship's ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} bar gradually fills up on each of your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} in combat, at the end of each battle, and as a result of certain events during space exploration.

traits.locale_text: La barra de {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}recuperación{/g} de capacidad definitiva se llena gradualmente con cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de tu {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} en combate, al final de cada batalla y como consecuencia de eventos concretos durante la exploración del espacio.

languages.text: 船の究極の{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}バーは、戦闘中の{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}や各戦闘の終了時、宇宙探索中の特定のイベントの結果などで、徐々に埋まっていく。
languages.original_text: The ship's ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} bar gradually fills up on each of your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} in combat, at the end of each battle, and as a result of certain events during space exploration.

traits.locale_text: 船の究極の{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}バーは、戦闘中の{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}や各戦闘の終了時、宇宙探索中の特定のイベントの結果などで、徐々に埋まっていく。

languages.text: 舰船的终极能力{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却{/g}条会在{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，每场战斗结束时，以及太空探索期间触发特定事件时填充。
languages.original_text: The ship's ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} bar gradually fills up on each of your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} in combat, at the end of each battle, and as a result of certain events during space exploration.

traits.locale_text: 舰船的终极能力{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却{/g}条会在{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，每场战斗结束时，以及太空探索期间触发特定事件时填充。

languages.text: Die Leiste der ultimativen {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} füllt sich allmählich in jedem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} deines {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} im Kampf, am Ende jedes Kampfes, und durch bestimmte Ereignisse während der Weltraumerkundung.
languages.original_text: The ship's ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} bar gradually fills up on each of your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} in combat, at the end of each battle, and as a result of certain events during space exploration.

traits.locale_text: Die Leiste der ultimativen {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} füllt sich allmählich in jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} deines {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} im Kampf, am Ende jedes Kampfes, und durch bestimmte Ereignisse während der Weltraumerkundung.

languages.text: La barre de {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}recharge{/g} ultime du vaisseau se remplit progressivement à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de votre {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} au combat, à la fin de chaque bataille et à la suite de certains événements liés à l'exploration spatiale.
languages.original_text: The ship's ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} bar gradually fills up on each of your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} in combat, at the end of each battle, and as a result of certain events during space exploration.

traits.locale_text: La barre de {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}récupération{/g} ultime du vaisseau se remplit progressivement à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de votre {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} au combat, à la fin de chaque bataille et à la suite de certains événements liés à l'exploration spatiale.

languages.text: Geminin üstün {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}dolum süresi{/g} çubuğu, {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}sancak gemisinin{/g} çatışmadaki her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turuyla{/g} beraber, her çatışmanın sonunda ve uzay keşfi sırasındaki belirli olayların sonucunda adım adım dolar.
languages.original_text: The ship's ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} bar gradually fills up on each of your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} in combat, at the end of each battle, and as a result of certain events during space exploration.
